plugins.name: Slack
plugins.description: Get real-time notifications about AI model updates, risk assessments, and compliance changes directly in your Slack workspace.
plugins.longDescription: Slack integration enables your team to receive real-time notifications about critical events in VerifyWise. Configure notification routing to send different types of alerts to specific channels, ensuring your team stays informed about AI governance activities, policy changes, risk assessments, and compliance updates.
plugins.author: VerifyWise

features.name: Channel Routing

plugins.name: MLflow
plugins.description: Track and manage machine learning experiments, models, and deployments with comprehensive ML lifecycle management.
plugins.longDescription: MLflow integration connects VerifyWise with your MLflow tracking server, enabling automatic synchronization of ML models and experiments. Track model versions, monitor training metrics, and maintain a comprehensive inventory of all ML models used in your AI systems for compliance and governance purposes.
plugins.author: VerifyWise

features.name: Model Tracking
features.description: Automatically sync ML models from your MLflow server

features.name: Version Control
features.description: Maintain model version history and lineage

features.name: Metrics Monitoring
features.description: Monitor model performance metrics and parameters

plugins.name: Risk Import
plugins.description: Import risks from Excel files for bulk risk creation and management.
plugins.longDescription: Risk Import plugin enables bulk import of risks from Excel files with dropdown data validation. Download a pre-formatted Excel template with dropdown menus for enum fields, fill it with your risk data using the convenient dropdowns, and upload to create multiple risks at once. Features comprehensive validation, detailed error reporting, and support for all risk fields including lifecycle phases, severity levels, and mitigation plans.
plugins.author: VerifyWise

features.name: Excel Template Download
features.description: Download pre-formatted Excel template with dropdown validation

features.name: Dropdown Data Validation
features.description: Built-in dropdown menus for enum fields in Excel

features.name: Bulk Import
features.description: Upload Excel to create multiple risks at once

features.name: Import Results
features.description: Detailed feedback on successful and failed imports
